column4: I am having trouble with the liveCD can someone help me - When I start the computer with the live cd, the splash screen appears, but the GUI never appears and i am left at a safe graphics mode with only a termanal
you may have a corrupted disk
no, it worked in a virtural machine
i checked the cd for errors, no problems
the disk worked for a virtual machine and i checked the cd for defects, there are no problems on the cd
i am worried that when installing the alternate cd would have the same problem. i have a gforce 7000m nforce 610 graphics card and gpu
try it and see how it goes
i will, just one problem, i wanted to test it out without installing because i am worried about screwing up my *sigh* vista partion and i don't have an installation disk
if you REALLY want to try it and the livecd doesnt work, you can make a small partition using vista's partitioner
i know that, the windows boot loader (on my now broken desktop) never picked up on the ubuntu, and i would actually like to keep the windows bootloader.
install it in the virtual machine?
the windows bootloader never picked it up
you can help someone else for now, i can wait
i am downloading the alternate install disk
